problem.markdown: What is the problem with having more and more multimedia data online that is touched on in the last clip? ( ) There is not enough space to store the data. ( ) People want more ways to share information. (x) Retrival methods are not good enough. ( ) It takes too long to retrieve things for searches.
problem.p: What is the problem with having more and more multimedia data online that is touched on in the last clip?

choicegroup.choice: There is not enough space to store the data.
People want more ways to share information.
Retrival methods are not good enough.
It takes too long to retrieve things for searches.
